attributes.action: Makde Transfer Deadline Day a public holiday
attributes.additional_details:
August 31st and January 31st also known as Transfer Deadline day is one of the biggest events in world football for fans all over the world.

Fans all over the world take the day off work and spend the day keeping up to date with all the players coming and going in and out of their respective football clubs.

We ask the government to consider making these days a public holiday within the United Kingdom.
